title: Lead reserves worldwide by country 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Reserves in million metric tons for 12 number of Countrys.
The maximum Reserves in million metric tons 36.0 is found at Country Australia and the minimum is found at Other countries where Country is 0.0.
Country Other countries has 3600000000000.0 times less Reserves in million metric tons than Country Australia which is the highest.
